SourceAnalyzer.Name: Documentation Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Rules which verify the content and formatting of code documentation.

BooleanProperty.Name: IgnorePrivates
BooleanProperty.Description: Do not require documentation for elements with private access.

BooleanProperty.Name: IgnoreInternals
BooleanProperty.Description: Do not require documentation for elements with internal access.

StringProperty.Name: CompanyName
StringProperty.Description: The company name to display in file headers.

StringProperty.Name: Copyright
StringProperty.Description: The copyright tag to display in file headers.

Rule.Name: ElementsMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The {0} must have a documentation header.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element contains a properly formatted documentation header.

Rule.Name: PartialElementsMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The partial {0} element must have a documentation header containing either a summary tag or a content tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a partial class, struct, etc. contains a valid documentation header which contains either a summary tag or a content tag.

Rule.Name: EnumerationItemsMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The enumeration sub-item must have a documentation header.
Rule.Description: Validates that an item within an enumeration contains a properly formatted documentation header.

Rule.Name: DocumentationMustContainValidXml
Rule.Context: The documentation header is composed of invalid Xml: {0}
Rule.Description: Indicates that a documentation header is composed of invalid Xml and cannot be parsed.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationMustHaveSummary
Rule.Context: The documentation header must have a summary tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a documentation header contains a properly formatted summary tag.

Rule.Name: PartialElementDocumentationMustHaveSummary
Rule.Context: The partial element's documentation header must contain either a summary tag or content tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a partial class, struct, etc. contains a documentation header with a properly formatted summary tag or content tag.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationMustHaveSummaryText
Rule.Context: The summary section in the documentation header must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's summary tag contains a filled-in description.

Rule.Name: PartialElementDocumentationMustHaveSummaryText
Rule.Context: The summary or content section in the documentation header must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that a partial class, struct, etc. contains a documentation header with a filled-in summary description.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationMustNotHaveDefaultSummary
Rule.Context: The documentation header still contains the default summary text generated by Visual Studio.
Rule.Description: Validates that the summary tag in an element's documentation header is not the default text generated by Visual Studio.

Rule.Name: PropertyDocumentationMustHaveValue
Rule.Context: The public or protected property's documentation header must contain a value tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a public or protected property contains a documentation header with a value tag.

Rule.Name: PropertyDocumentationMustHaveValueText
Rule.Context: The value section in the property's documentation header must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that a property's value tag contains a filled-in description.

Rule.Name: ElementParametersMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The documentation header must contain param tags matching the element's parameter list.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains a param tag for each item in the element's parameter list.

Rule.Name: ElementParameterDocumentationMustMatchElementParameters
Rule.Context: The param tags in the documentation header must match the element's parameter list.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header does not contain param tags for parameters which do not exist in the element's parameter list.

Rule.Name: ElementParameterDocumentationMustDeclareParameterName
Rule.Context: All param tags in the documentation header must contain a 'name' attribute.
Rule.Description: Validates that all param tags in an element's documentation header contain a filled-in name attribute.

Rule.Name: ElementParameterDocumentationMustHaveText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the param tag for the '{0}' parameter must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains filled-in descriptions for each parameter in the element's parameter list.

Rule.Name: ElementReturnValueMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The documentation header must contain a returns tag since the element has a return value.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains a returns tag if the element has a return value.

Rule.Name: ElementReturnValueDocumentationMustHaveText
Rule.Context: The returns section in the documentation header must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's returns tag contains a filled-in description.

Rule.Name: VoidReturnValueMustNotBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The documentation header should not contain a returns tag, since the element has no return value.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header does not contain a returns tag if the element has no return value.

Rule.Name: GenericTypeParametersMustBeDocumented
Rule.Context: The documentation header must contain typeparam tags matching the generic types for the {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains a typeparam tag for each of the element's generic types.

Rule.Name: GenericTypeParametersMustBeDocumentedPartialClass
Rule.Context: The documentation header must contain typeparam tags matching the generic types for the {0}. If the typeparam tags are documented on another part of the partial {0}, change the 'summary' tag to a 'content' tag to indicate that the primary documentation is placed on another part of the partial {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that a partial class, struct, etc. contains a documentation header with a typeparam tag for each of the element's generic types, unless these types are documented on another part of the element.

Rule.Name: GenericTypeParameterDocumentationMustMatchTypeParameters
Rule.Context: The typeparam tags in the documentation header must match the generic types for the {0}.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header does not contain typeparam tags for types which are not part of the element's generic type list.

Rule.Name: GenericTypeParameterDocumentationMustDeclareParameterName
Rule.Context: All typeparam tags in the documentation header must contain a 'name' attribute.
Rule.Description: Validates that all typeparam tags in an element's documentation header contain a filled-in name attribute.

Rule.Name: GenericTypeParameterDocumentationMustHaveText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the typeparam tag for the '{0}' parameter must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains filled-in descriptions for each item in the element's generic type list.

Rule.Name: PropertySummaryDocumentationMustMatchAccessors
Rule.Context: The property's documentation summary text must begin with: {0}
Rule.Description: Validates that a property's summary description text begins with the correct syntax, depending upon whether the property exposes get or set accessors.

Rule.Name: PropertySummaryDocumentationMustOmitSetAccessorWithRestrictedAccess
Rule.Context: Because the property only contains a visible get accessor, the documentation summary text must begin with '{0}'.
Rule.Description: Validates that a property's summary description text does not include a description for a set accessor when the property exposes only a get accessor.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationMustNotBeCopiedAndPasted
Rule.Context: The documentation header contains two or more identical documentation strings. The only documentation text which may be duplicated is '{0}'.
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header does not contain repeated documentation text.

Rule.Name: SingleLineCommentsMustNotUseDocumentationStyleSlashes
Rule.Context: Single-line comments must not begin with three slashes, which are reserved for lines within an Xml documentation header.
Rule.Description: Validates that comments do not begin with three forward slashes in a row, making them difficult to distinguish from documentation headers.

Rule.Name: DocumentationTextMustNotBeEmpty
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that the description within a documentation tag is filled-in.

Rule.Name: DocumentationTextMustBeginWithACapitalLetter
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag must begin with a capital letter.
Rule.Description: Validates that the documentation text within a documentation section begins with a capital letter.

Rule.Name: DocumentationTextMustEndWithAPeriod
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag must end with a period.
Rule.Description: Validates that the documentation text within a documentation section ends with a period.

Rule.Name: DocumentationTextMustContainWhitespace
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag does not contain any whitespace between words, indicating that it most likely does not follow a proper grammatical structure required for documentation text.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the documentation text within a documentation section contains at least two words, separated by whitespace.

Rule.Name: DocumentationMustMeetCharacterPercentage
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag does not appear to follow a proper grammatical structure required for documentation text.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the documentation text within a documentation section does not contain an excessive amount of symbols, making it difficult to read.

Rule.Name: DocumentationTextMustMeetMinimumCharacterLength
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag must be at least {1} characters in length. Documentation failing to meet this guideline most likely does not follow a proper grammatical structure required for documentation text.
Rule.Description: Verifies that the documentation text within a documentation section meets or exceeds the minimum length.

Rule.Name: ConstructorSummaryDocumentationMustBeginWithStandardText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the constructor's summary tag must begin with the text: {0}.
Rule.Description: Verifies that a constructor's summary text begins with the appropriate wording.

Rule.Name: DestructorSummaryDocumentationMustBeginWithStandardText
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the destructor's summary tag must begin with the text: {0}.
Rule.Description: Verifies that a destructor's summary text begins with the appropriate wording.

Rule.Name: DocumentationHeadersMustNotContainBlankLines
Rule.Context: The documentation header must not contain blank lines. Use the 'para' tag to insert line breaks within documentation text.
Rule.Description: Verifies that a documentation header does not contain blank lines.

Rule.Name: IncludedDocumentationFileDoesNotExist
Rule.Context: The included documentation header file does not exist or cannot be loaded: {0}
Rule.Description: Verifies that an included documentation header file can be loaded.

Rule.Name: IncludedDocumentationXPathDoesNotExist
Rule.Context: The XPath string '{0}' cannot be loaded from the included documentation file: {1}
Rule.Description: Verifies that an included documentation tag's XPath expression is valid.

Rule.Name: IncludeNodeDoesNotContainValidFileAndPath
Rule.Context: The 'include' tag does not contain a valid 'file' and 'path' attribute: {0}
Rule.Description: Verifies that an 'include' tag contains a valid file and path attribute.

Rule.Name: InheritDocMustBeUsedWithInheritingClass
Rule.Context: The 'inheritdoc' tag should not be used when the class or interface does not inherit from a base class or interface.
Rule.Description: Verifies that an 'inheritdoc' tag is not used when the class or interface does not inherit from a base class or interface.

Rule.Name: ElementDocumentationMustBeSpelledCorrectly
Rule.Context: The documentation text within the {0} tag contains incorrectly spelled words: {1}
Rule.Description: Validates that an element's documentation header contains correctly spelled words.

Rule.Name: FileMustHaveHeader
Rule.Context: The file has no header, the header Xml is invalid, or the header is not located at the top of the file.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file contains a properly formatted file header.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderMustShowCopyright
Rule.Context: The file header must contain a copyright tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a copyright tag.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderMustHaveCopyrightText
Rule.Context: The copyright tag in the file header must not be empty.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a filled-in copyright tag.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderCopyrightTextMustMatch
Rule.Context: The copyright tag in the file header must contain the following text: {0}
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a copyright matching specific copyright text.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderMustContainFileName
Rule.Context: The copyright tag in the file header must contain a 'file' attribute which contains the name of the file.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a file attribute.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderFileNameDocumentationMustMatchFileName
Rule.Context: The file attribute in the file header's copyright tag must contain the name of the file.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a file attribute which contains the name of the file.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderMustHaveSummary
Rule.Context: The file header must contain a non-empty summary tag.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a filled-in summary description.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderMustHaveValidCompanyText
Rule.Context: The copyright tag in the file header must contain a company attribute which contains the name of the company.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a filled-in company attribute.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderCompanyNameTextMustMatch
Rule.Context: The company attribute in the file header must contain the following company name: {0}
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a company attribute which contains a specific company name.

Rule.Name: FileHeaderFileNameDocumentationMustMatchTypeName
Rule.Context: The file attribute in the file header's copyright tag must contain the name of the first type in the file and can be any of these: {0}
Rule.Description: Validates that a file header contains a file attribute which contains the name of the first type in the file.
